languages.text: "Помилуйте, Ваша Светлость! Я, конечно, мог от неопытности что-то перепутать, вот вам и "нестыковки". Прошу — давайте дойдем до командного центра губернатора. Я должен исполнить свой приказ. А там — если пожелаете, пусть меня проверит разведка. Я — верный солдат, это точно!"

"I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"
languages.original_text: "Помилуйте, Ваша Светлость! Я, конечно, мог от неопытности что-то перепутать, вот вам и "нестыковки". Прошу — давайте дойдем до командного центра губернатора. Я должен исполнить свой приказ. А там — если пожелаете, пусть меня проверит разведка. Я — верный солдат, это точно!"

traits.locale_text: "For goodness' sake, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've got a few things mixed up from lack of experience, and that's why they don't 'add up.' Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must fulfil my orders. Once we get there, you can have intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

"For goodness' sake, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've got a few things mixed up from lack of experience, and that's why they don't 'add up.' Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must fulfil my orders. Once we get there, you can have intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

I must fulfil my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

I must fulfil my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

"I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

"I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

languages.text: "Ich schwöre es, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich habe vielleicht aus Unerfahrenheit einiges durcheinandergebracht, deswegen gibt es Ungereimtheiten. Bitte, gehen wir zur Befehlszentrale des Gouverneurs. Ich muss meinen Befehl ausführen. Wenn wir dort sind, könnt Ihr mich vom Geheimdienst überprüfen lassen, wenn Ihr möchtet. Ich bin ein treuer Soldat, und das ist die Wahrheit!"
languages.original_text: "I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich schwöre es, Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft! Ich habe vielleicht aus Unerfahrenheit einiges durcheinandergebracht, deswegen gibt es Ungereimtheiten. Bitte, gehen wir zur Befehlszentrale des Gouverneurs. Ich muss meinen Befehl ausführen. Wenn wir dort sind, könnt Ihr mich vom Geheimdienst überprüfen lassen, wenn Ihr möchtet. Ich bin ein treuer Soldat, und das ist die Wahrheit!"

languages.text: « Je vous donne ma parole, Votre Seigneurie ! Je me suis peut-être mélangé les pédales par manque d'expérience, c'est pour ça que ça ne colle pas. S'il vous plaît, allons au centre de commandement du gouverneur. Je dois exécuter mes ordres. Une fois sur place, vous pourrez demander aux renseignements de m'interroger si vous le souhaitez. Je suis un soldat loyal, c'est la vérité ! »
languages.original_text: "I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

traits.locale_text: « Je vous donne ma parole, Votre Seigneurie ! Je me suis peut-être mélangé les pédales par manque d'expérience, c'est pour ça que ça ne colle pas. S'il vous plaît, allons au centre de commandement du gouverneur. Je dois exécuter mes ordres. Une fois sur place, vous pourrez demander aux renseignements de m'interroger si vous le souhaitez. Je suis un soldat loyal, c'est la vérité ! »

languages.text: “我发誓我绝不是叛徒，大人！有可能是我经验不足，把某些事情搞混了，所以有些地方可能才会前后不一致。我求您了，我们还是先去总督的指挥中心吧。我必须履行我的职责。等我们到了那里之后，如果您愿意，您可以让情报部门对我进行调查。我是一名忠诚的士兵，真的！”
languages.original_text: "I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

traits.locale_text: “我发誓我绝不是叛徒，大人！有可能是我经验不足，把某些事情搞混了，所以有些地方可能才会前后不一致。我求您了，我们还是先去总督的指挥中心吧。我必须履行我的职责。等我们到了那里之后，如果您愿意，您可以让情报部门对我进行调查。我是一名忠诚的士兵，真的！”

languages.text: 「誓います、陛下！経験不足からいくつかのことを混同してしまったかもしれません。だからこそ矛盾しているのかもしれません。お願いです、総督の司令部に向かいましょう。私は命令を果たさなければなりません。到着して、もしお望みであれば、情報部門で私を調べてもらっても構いません。私は忠実な兵士であり、それが真実です！」
languages.original_text: "I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

traits.locale_text: 「誓います、{mf|陛下|陛下}！経験不足からいくつかのことを混同してしまったかもしれません。だからこそ矛盾しているのかもしれません。お願いです、知事の司令部に向かいましょう。私は命令を果たさなければなりません。到着して、もしお望みであれば、情報部門で私を調べてもらっても構いません。私は忠実な兵士であり、それが真実です！」

languages.text: «¡Lo juro, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Puede que me haya confundido en algunas cosas por falta de experiencia y por eso no cuadran. Por favor, caminemos hasta el centro de mando del gobernador. Debo cumplir mis órdenes. Una vez lleguemos, puede hacer que los servicios de inteligencia me investiguen si lo desea. Soy un soldado leal y esa es la verdad!».
languages.original_text: "I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Lo juro, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Puede que me haya confundido en algunas cosas por falta de experiencia y por eso no cuadran. Por favor, caminemos hasta el centro de mando del gobernador. Debo cumplir mis órdenes. Una vez lleguemos, puede hacer que los servicios de inteligencia me investiguen si lo desea. «Soy un soldado leal y esa es la verdad!».

languages.text: "Yemin ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Acemilikten bazı şeyleri karıştırmışımdır, o yüzden birbirini tutmuyordur. Lütfen valinin komuta merkezine gidelim. Verilen emri yerine getirmeliyim. Oraya ulaştığımızda isterseniz hakkımda istihbarat araştırması yaptırın. Ben sadık bir askerim, gerçek budur!"
languages.original_text: "I swear, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship! I may've gotten a few things mixed up from inexperience, and that's why they don't add up. Please, let's walk to the governor's command centre. I must carry out my orders. Once we get there, you can have the intelligence run a check on me if you wish. I'm a loyal soldier and that's the truth!"

traits.locale_text: "Yemin ederim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Acemilikten bazı şeyleri karıştırmışımdır, o yüzden birbirini tutmuyordur. Lütfen valinin komuta merkezine gidelim. Verilen emri yerine getirmeliyim. Oraya ulaştığımızda isterseniz hakkımda istihbarat araştırması yaptırın. Ben sadık bir askerim, gerçek budur!"
